com.alee.utils
Class TimeUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.alee.utils.TimeUtils

public class TimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of utilities for time measurement and comparison.

Since:
1.4
Author:
Mikle Garin
